name: Possession: Escape from the Nether Regions
name_original: Possession: Escape from the Nether Regions
description:
Play as a ghost escaped from the Nether Regions, trying to make your way to the surface. You are incredibly frail, but have one advantage: you can possess the bodies of the monsters you encounter. Created for the 2013 7-Day Roguelike Challenge.

Features:

  • 5 levels, each with unique possessable monsters
  • A wide variety of creature powers
  • Exploding bodies!
  • Item-less gameplay
  • A monsterpedia, which tracks the details of the monsters you possess
  • Quick to pick up and play
  • Humorous descriptions
  • ASCII or graphical modes, seperate for both creatures and the environment.

A sequel, simply called Possession, is currently in production.
